item.title: Align div to bottom of the page in 3 steps
item.description: Aligning an element at the bottom of the page is a very common issue in web development and css. You will find the best practices for aligning the div at the bottom of the page. Step 1 : Setting the parent position to relative. If you want to align a div at the bottom of a parent div, the parent should have a position : relative. <style> .parent{ position : relative; /* Set parent position to relative */ } </style> <div class="parent"> <div class="bottom"> </div> </div> Step 2 : Setting the div position to absolute.
